column1: Kata Robata////For those comparing Kata Robata and Uchi...I've been to both restaurants frequently
column2: and really they are just too different to compare. Uchi is definitely more innovative
column3: and I would always stick to their hot and cold tastings. Kata Robata's strong suit is definitely its sushi
column4: whereas I would not ever order sushi at Uchi. Just my two cents!
